UuJokesCore.Joke.Detail.View.subtitle: Joke
UuJokesCore.Joke.Detail.View.info: It is a joke. It should be funny.

UuJokesCore.Joke.Detail.UpdateModal.info: Here you can edit the title, category, image or text of the joke. If you enter an image and text at the same time, both values ​​will be saved, but only the image will be displayed.
UuJokesCore.Joke.Detail.UpdateModal.textOrFile: Text or image must be provided.

UuJokesCore.Joke.Detail.RateModal.info: Here you can rate the joke and your vote will be counted towards the joke's average rating. You can rate it repeatedly, but only the last vote is counted.

UuJokesCore.Joke.Detail.PreferenceModal.info: This form allows you to change configuration of shown joke details. You can hide or show jokes' categories, author or creation time. The modifications are saved in MyTerritory application and used next time you visit this component. When you copy the component the favorite configuration is copied too. If you require different configuration for copy just change value of the propertyComponent identifier (uu5Id).

UuJokesCore.Joke.List.View.subtitle: Jokes
UuJokesCore.Joke.List.View.info: The list of jokes with possibility to filter and sort.
UuJokesCore.Joke.List.View.createAlertMessage: Joke with name ${name} was sucessfully created.

UuJokesCore.Joke.List.CreateModal.info: Here you can crete new joke and enter its title, category, image or text. If you enter an image and text at the same time, both values ​​will be saved, but only the image will be displayed.
UuJokesCore.Joke.List.CreateModal.textOrFile: Text or image must be provided.

UuJokesCore.Category.List.View.subtitle: Categories
UuJokesCore.Category.List.View.createAlertMessage: Category with name ${name} was sucessfully created.

UuJokesCore.Category.List.CreateModal.info: Here you can create new category and enter its name and icon

UuJokesCore.Category.List.UpdateModal.info: Here you can update existing category and modify its name and icon

UuJokesCore.Workspace.BasicInfo.View.subtitle: Basic info
UuJokesCore.Workspace.BasicInfo.View.info: The basic information about the application workspace.

UuJokesCore.Workspace.BasicInfo.StateMod.info: Here you can modify the workspace's state.

UuJokesCore.Workspace.BasicInfo.UpdateMo.info: Here you can modify the workspace's name.
